findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract allows for potential unauthorized script upgrades due to lack of access control or validation.

findings.title: antiBot vulnerability in increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function has an antiBot vulnerability.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in setTradingStatus function
findings.description: The smart contract owner has elevated privileges to change trading status without restrictions.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The onlyOwner modifier allows the smart contract owner to have elevated privileges, which can lead to security risks if not properly managed.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in includeInReward function
findings.description: The smart contract owner has elevated privileges to modify critical functions, posing a potential security risk.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in excludeFromFee function
findings.description: The smart contract owner has elevated privileges to manipulate fees without restrictions.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in includeInFee function
findings.description: The smart contract owner has the ability to change fees, which can be used to impose extraordinary transaction fees.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in setTaxes function
findings.description: The smart contract owner has the ability to change taxes, which can impose extraordinary transaction fees.

findings.title: onlyOwner vulnerability in setSellTaxes function
findings.description: The smart contract owner can change the sell taxes without any threshold or restriction.
